## Example launch.json fragment

```jsonc
{
  "cwd": "${workspaceFolder}",
  "runtimeExecutable": "deno",
  "runtimeArgs": [
    "run",
    "--inspect-brk",
    "--allow-all"
],
"attachSimplePort": 9229
```
